posts.post_content:
Up front I am buying these for an upcoming show.

I prefer to trade or add PP to a card. I do have up to $2k to spend. Im not looking for $500 cards.

Things Im looking for:

Raw T206 Lots
40s Stars Graded (Low to Mid Grades)
50s Stars Graded (Low to Mid Grades)
60s Stars Graded (Low to Mid Grades)
70s Stars RCs Graded (Low to Mid Grades)
80s Stars RCs Graded (High Grades)
90s Stars RCs Graded (High Grades)
Color RCs and Autos (Stars/Relevant Rookies)
SSP of 15-16 Heritage

Usual Suspects Autos, Logo Patches, low #ed Patches, Graded RCs
Harper, Griffey, Jeter, ect

Logo Patches and Logo Patch Autos (Laundry Tags, Swooshes, Reebok, Team Logos, ect) (Big Want as they may go into PC) (Relevant Players Only)

Lots of #ed Inserts/RCs 2014-2016

Lots of RCs 2015-2016
